content.text:
name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        platform:
          - os: ubuntu-latest
            generator: Unix Makefiles
          - os: macos-latest
            generator: Unix Makefiles
          - os: windows-latest
            generator: Visual Studio 17 2022
          - os: windows-latest
            generator: MSYS Makefiles
          - os: windows-latest
            generator: MinGW Makefiles

    runs-on: ${{ matrix.platform.os }}

    steps:
    - name: Check out
      uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Build
      run: |
        mkdir build
        cd build
        cmake .. -G "${{matrix.platform.generator}}"
        cmake --build .
